# Collaborate with Github

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
![](images/githubTeamLogo.jpg){width=4in}
:::
:::
Github has a number of tools that facilitate collaboration, including:


1. [Issues](https://sael-swfsc.github.io/OpenScience/content/issues.html)- Github issues are a tool for tracking and planning work, tasks, ideas, and bugs in a Github Repository.
2. [Projects](https://sael-swfsc.github.io/OpenScience/content/gitProject.html)- Github Projects are adaptable task-boards to help track and plan work
3. [Discussions](https://sael-swfsc.github.io/OpenScience/content/gitDiscussions.html)- Github Discussions is a platform for collaborative communication forum
